TEXT.English: Upgrade Name
TEXT.French: Upgrade Name
TEXT.German: Upgrade Name
TEXT.Italian: Upgrade Name

TEXT.English: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").
TEXT.French: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").
TEXT.German: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").
TEXT.Italian: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").

TEXT.English: Building
TEXT.French: Building
TEXT.German: Building
TEXT.Italian: Building

TEXT.English: When checked, the actual yield, commerce, happiness, health, and great people points the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.French: When checked, the actual yield, commerce, happiness, health, and great people points the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.German: When checked, the actual yield, commerce, happiness, health, and great people points the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the actual yield, commerce, happiness, health, and great people points the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the actual yield, commerce, happiness, health, and great people points the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.

TEXT.English: Speeds Up . . .
TEXT.French: Speeds Up . . .
TEXT.German: Speeds Up . . .
TEXT.Italian: Speeds Up . . .

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry wouldb e shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry wouldb e shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).
TEXT.German: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry wouldb e shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry wouldb e shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry wouldb e shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).

TEXT.English: Technology Trade Denial
TEXT.French: Technology Trade Denial
TEXT.German: Technology Trade Denial
TEXT.Italian: Technology Trade Denial

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.German: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.

TEXT.English: Resource Trade Denial
TEXT.French: Resource Trade Denial
TEXT.German: Resource Trade Denial
TEXT.Italian: Resource Trade Denial

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.German: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.

TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.

TEXT.English: Commerce Subtotals
TEXT.French: Commerce Subtotals
TEXT.German: Commerce Subtotals
TEXT.Italian: Commerce Subtotals

TEXT.English: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.German: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.

TEXT.English: Rate Breakdown
TEXT.French: Rate Breakdown
TEXT.German: Rate Breakdown
TEXT.Italian: Rate Breakdown

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.
TEXT.German: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.

TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.

TEXT.French: Maintenance
TEXT.German: Maintenance
TEXT.Italian: Maintenance

TEXT.English: Whip Button
TEXT.French: Whip Button
TEXT.German: Whip Button
TEXT.Italian: Whip Button

TEXT.English: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.
TEXT.French: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.
TEXT.German: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.

TEXT.English: Include Current
TEXT.French: Include Current
TEXT.German: Include Current
TEXT.Italian: Include Current

TEXT.English: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.
TEXT.French: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.
TEXT.German: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.

TEXT.English: Remove Specialist Button
TEXT.French: Remove Specialist Button
TEXT.German: Remove Specialist Button
TEXT.Italian: Remove Specialist Button

TEXT.English: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.
TEXT.French: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.
TEXT.German: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.

TEXT.English: Zoom to City Button
TEXT.French: Zoom to City Button
TEXT.German: Zoom to City Button
TEXT.Italian: Zoom to City Button

TEXT.English: When checked, the Zoom to City button includes detailed information about the city as when hovering over a city bar on the map.
TEXT.French: When checked, the Zoom to City button includes detailed information about the city as when hovering over a city bar on the map.
